frontmatter.title: 6 tips for building successful REST API
frontmatter.description: When you want to design an API, you quickly face the problem of API design. This stage raises a set of issues for which answers are not unanimous. I suggest you some tips on how to build a successful REST API.

headings.value: Avoid verbs in URL, use HTTP verbs instead
